[@log-more/base](./base.md) &gt; [ReportConfigBase](./base.reportconfigbase.md)

## ReportConfigBase interface

`Report` configuration parameters to be applied to a specific event type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReportConfigBase<TFormat extends FormatFunctionBase = FormatFunctionBase, TCapture extends CaptureFunctionBase = CaptureFunctionBase> extends EventConfig 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [EventConfig](./base.eventconfig.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [capture](./base.reportconfigbase.capture.md) | TCapture | The default function that will be used to capture the <code>Report</code>. Can be overridden by the user to apply custom logging. The default functionality will try to write the <code>Report</code> to the console. |
|  [format](./base.reportconfigbase.format.md) | TFormat | The default function that will be used to format the <code>Report</code>. Can be overridden by the user to apply custom formatting. The default functionality will try to use the template and Result object and into a Report string. |
|  [isIncludingStack](./base.reportconfigbase.isincludingstack.md) | boolean | An indicator specifying if a stack trace should be included in the <code>Report</code> |
|  [locale?](./base.reportconfigbase.locale.md) | Locale &#124; null | <i>(Optional)</i> The locale object to use when formatting the timestamp |
|  [messagePostfix?](./base.reportconfigbase.messagepostfix.md) | string &#124; null | <i>(Optional)</i> A postfix string to append to the end of all <code>Report</code> messages |
|  [messagePrefix?](./base.reportconfigbase.messageprefix.md) | string &#124; null | <i>(Optional)</i> A prefix string to prepend to the start of all <code>Report</code> messages |
|  [template?](./base.reportconfigbase.template.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A string specifying the report template to use when formatting the <code>Report</code> for this event type |
|  [templateFieldStart](./base.reportconfigbase.templatefieldstart.md) | string | The string used to mark the beginning of a field token in a <code>Report</code> template string |
|  [templateFieldStop](./base.reportconfigbase.templatefieldstop.md) | string | The string used to mark the end of a field token in a <code>Report</code> template string |
|  [timestampFormat](./base.reportconfigbase.timestampformat.md) | string | A string used to format the timestamp value appended to the <code>Report</code> event |
